channel.title: Bug when i add item
channel.description:
Hi, in my client, i got a dungeoneering int.. so i wanted to add it. so.. i added it in item.cfg and item.java and see the error when i run server..
[img]http://img168.imageshack.us/f/bugt.png/[/img]
and when i try to login, it's black!
[img]http://img833.imageshack.us/f/0064.png/[/img]
Please.. How i log in after that!
(if u don't see the pics, go at : http://img833.imageshack.us/f/0064.png/ and http://img168.imageshack.us/f/bugt.png/ )

item.title: Bug when i add item
item.dc:creator: @kpop kpop
item.description:
@kpop wrote:

im over the whole virus thing i just wanna help now. do u use notepad++ to edit, if so can u post the lines of code that i said there were errors on?

itemhandler.java lines 283 and 173
server.java line 108

also what source are u using

Read full topic

item.title: Bug when i add item
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

ok, usman, kpop just say his antivirus detected a virus on this website and me, i didnt want to give a trojan to the players… Maybe imageshack get hacked or something or idk what…

Read full topic

item.title: Bug when i add item
item.dc:creator: @kpop kpop
item.description:
@kpop wrote:

the error message suggests that you are trying to reach an array that is out of bounds in itemhandler.java and server.java
the value of the arrays is too high at lines 283 and 173 of ur itemhandler.java and line 108 of ur server.java and usman u should calm down

Read full topic

item.title: Bug when i add item
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“kpop, post:2, topic:352987”]i dont know if it was planned or not but the link u gave for the first pic attempted to add a trojan virus to my computer, add the image correctly or upload it to a different site. Ill still take a look at the pics and see if i know whats wrong.[/quote]How much of this crap will you post? Please don’t post here.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug when i add item

item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

hmm… copy-paste the link and replace /f/ with /i/… maybe? Cuz it’s an image hosting website…

@kpop wrote:

well i clicked the link and my kaspersky antivirus immediately popped up and showed the link to the page and said there was a trojan attempting to start, maybe it was just an add they have

@laurent_248 wrote:

Trojan? It’s imageshack… i use it everytime for all my pic and theres no trojan…

item.description:
@kpop wrote:

i dont know if it was planned or not but the link u gave for the first pic attempted to add a trojan virus to my computer, add the image correctly or upload it to a different site. Ill still take a look at the pics and see if i know whats wrong.
